targets.expr: round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{destination_service_namespace="yummy-staging", response_code="200"}[30s])) by (destination_version, destination_service_name), 0.001)

round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload=~"$workload", reporter="source", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[30s])) by (destination_service, response_code), 0.001)

round(sum(irate(istio_requests_total{connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload=~"$workload", reporter="source", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[30s])) by (destination_service, response_code), 0.001)

panels.title: Outgoing Requests by Destination And Response Code

targets.expr: sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload=~"$workload",response_code!~"5.*", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[30s])) by (destination_service) / sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload=~"$workload", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[30s])) by (destination_service)

sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload=~"$workload",response_code!~"5.*", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[30s])) by (destination_service) / sum(rate(istio_requests_total{reporter="source", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload=~"$workload", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[30s])) by (destination_service)

panels.title: Outgoing Success Rate (non-5xx responses) By Destination

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy!="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(irate(istio_request_bytes_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

histogram_quantile(0.90, sum(irate(istio_request_bytes_bucket{reporter="source", connection_security_policy="mutual_tls", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", destination_service=~"$dstsvc"}[1m])) by (destination_service, le))

list.label: Workload
list.name: workload
list.query: query_result((sum(istio_requests_total{destination_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (destination_workload) or sum(istio_requests_total{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (source_workload)) or (sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{destination_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (destination_workload) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (source_workload)))

list.label: Inbound Workload Namespace
list.name: srcns
list.query: query_result( sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", destination_workload="$workload", destination_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (source_workload_namespace) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_workload="$workload", destination_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (source_workload_namespace))

list.label: Inbound Workload
list.name: srcwl
list.query: query_result( sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="destination", destination_workload="$workload", destination_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}) by (source_workload) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="destination", destination_workload="$workload", destination_workload_namespace=~"$namespace", source_workload_namespace=~"$srcns"}) by (source_workload))

list.label: Destination Service
list.name: dstsvc
list.query: query_result( sum(istio_requests_total{reporter="source", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (destination_service) or sum(istio_tcp_sent_bytes_total{reporter="source", source_workload=~"$workload", source_workload_namespace=~"$namespace"}) by (destination_service))
